profile.name: Renarchi
profile.bio: I'm Interested in Single Image Super Resolution (SISR)

projects.title: 4x_Alchemy
projects.desc: A finalized SISR model optimized for manga covers and webtoons.

projects.title: Fallin:re
projects.desc: Experimental model focusing on realtime upscaling. Currently in closed beta.

projects.title: Fallin (Legacy)
projects.desc: Previous generation real-time upscalers for 1080p anime. Includes 'Soft' and 'Strong' variants.

gallery.title: Fallin:re Showcase
gallery.desc: Comparison on anime scenes. Compared to previous Fallin models (Soft & Strong), better details, better lines and the aliasing problem is fixed

gallery.title: Fallin 'Soft'
gallery.desc: Safe choice for 1080p. Excellent at removing compression artifacts and denoising without oversharpening.

gallery.title: Fallin 'Strong'
gallery.desc: Aggressive version with better DOF. Warning: May produce oversharpening artifacts on lines and face whitening issues.

changelog.title: Migrated to Imgsli
changelog.content: Moved all visual benchmarks to Imgsli for better interactive comparison tools.

changelog.title: Fallin:re (WIP) Showcase Live
changelog.content: Transitioned Fallin model to private showcase.

changelog.title: Fallin Released
changelog.content: Released 'Soft' and 'Strong' versions. 'Soft' focuses on safety/denoising, while 'Strong' maximizes sharpness and DOF.

changelog.title: Project Initialization & Alchemy
changelog.content: Repository established. 4x_Alchemy released as the first public stable model for Manga Cover/Webtoons.
